column4: can someone tell me what my permissions should be got my phpmyadmin dir ?

ya, i have that... but when i try to load it in the browser.. i get Fatal error: require_once() [function.require] : Failed opening required './libraries/common.lib.php' (include_path='.:/usr/share/php:/usr/share/pear') in /usr/share/phpmyadmin/index.php on line 36
